_header: To-night is born a bairn in Caernarvon
_description: Thomas of Erceldoune’s Prophecy — ten irregular lines, roughly couplets

BLAru57.First Lines:
To nyȝt is boren a barn in Kaernervamþat ssal wold ou þe out
                    ydlis ylc an…
BLAru57.Last Lines:
…Hwan Rokysburþ is no burþHwan men gyven an folu of twenti
                    pound for an seme of hwete
